text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, have you heard of that one café? 
Word has it everyone comes out feeling refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Young Woman A
text_block_list.text:
Of course I've heard! It's said— 
That they serve up that precious courage you need.

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student A
text_block_list.text: Have you thought about your chocos～!?

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student B
text_block_list.text:
Keep it down, will you… Yeah though, Valentine soon huh～ 
……… Maybe I'll… give someone chocolate this year.

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa f'real!? Is it time!? You're going for the special stuff!? 
Finally gonna confess your feelings～!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(T-thethe the s-special stuff…!? 
W-which means she has a special someone…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Waaaaaaaah～～!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahh……… Haaah～～… 
Confessing……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……… “To me, confessions are—”

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(I pull out my "textbook". Its pages sugary sweet and glittery. 
My secret book that teaches a person like me about all sorts 
of excitement she would know nothing of.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(Lately I'm really taken by "Sweet Memory Teatime". It's about 
a high school girl named Hikari who is torn between two boys.)
※The following content is Mejiro Ryan's fantasy.

text_block_list.name: Kaga
text_block_list.text: … Come on, don't avoid me. Hikari. Let's go to the beach again this year, together.

text_block_list.name: Hikari
text_block_list.text: We can't! You have your cute fiancé. … You should spend more time with her.

text_block_list.name: Mine
text_block_list.text: … Hikari?

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
Hikari dashes out of the room. Her feelings, the love she 
thought she gave up on, spilling from her eyes. She runs, 
and runs… until she reaches the café where she works.

text_block_list.name: Staff Twins
text_block_list.text: Welcome to Sweet Memory Teatime! Wait, Hikari?! Hmmhuh? You didn't have a shift today, did you?!

text_block_list.name: Café Postergirl
text_block_list.text: … That's alright, it just means she's a customer today! Come over here, Hikari. The counter's free.

text_block_list.name: Kind Patissier
text_block_list.text: … Hikari. I heard a lot from Master. I'll make you some special chocolates, so come find me later.

text_block_list.name: Hikari
text_block_list.text: Special chocolates…?

text_block_list.name: Café Barista
text_block_list.text: That's right. The kind you give as present. … Hikari, go and give them to the person you love.

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
The resident barista, referred to as Master, had realized. 
How Hikari had been trying to settle her feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
That's why she gave her a small push, 
gently trying to bring out her courage.

text_block_list.name: Café Barista
text_block_list.text: …… You like him, don't you? That boy.

text_block_list.name: Café Barista
text_block_list.text: As long as you hold those feelings in your heart, your love will remain. Shape them into words, get them off your chest, and into his.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
And with Master's gentle push, Hikari finally managed 
to give her chocolates to the boy she loved.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Haaah… She's so cool…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: She really is… such a wonderful person.
Oh-ho, who's this wonderful person?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Why, Master, of course! Like her mature air as she guides Hikari…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Or, I'm not sure how to say it but… 
―― I wish I could be like her.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ………? Hallo hallo—?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I-Ines!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ahah～. What a lovely story! 
Why don't you give it a try, Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ――Turn your yearnings into reality!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hmmn, wanna try a part-time job at a café? 
Lemme see, where can we go on short notice this time of year…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
N-nah, it's fine! You don't have to humor my fantasies! 
Besides, if I asked grandma about working—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
……Hmmm? So you're saying we need to check 
with your grandmother first, are you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
…… And that's how we… Yes. A friend… ended up 
suggesting we try working at a café for a little while.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, b-but I'm well aware. I have a lot more important things to do than lose my—… Hehh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… What do you mean everything's an experi— …… You'll talk to an acquaintance…? … Huh?… Huuuuuuuuhh!?

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Yep! I've heard from your grandmother! 
The shop's all yours to use as you wish!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
As the owner I'll be around to lend a hand but… 
Well, as long as you don't tear anything down you're 
free to play around with the menu and such!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
B-but even if it's for a short while, won't there be… problems 
with me as barista? What if your reputation goes down…

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text: Oh it's fine, don't worry! I've just been running this place as something like a hobby anyways. If anything, to think that an active Mejiro lady would run this café… ooh myyy!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Right, I need to custom-order some outfits! 
For you and your friend here! Oh, and… the schedule!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
We'll have to make sure the store's yours on your days off! 
Dear me, this old woman's found a new reason to live!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahah～, the owner seems like a very kind person!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But isn't this a little too good to be true? A little 
too convenient?Is this a dream? It's a dream, right? 
Ines, can you pinch my cheeks?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Don't mind if I do!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Eeek!? …… Owowow. 
…… I don't think this is a dream……
